description: Build xác nhận kế toán Vinasure
body:
INSERT INTO dbo.CashCollectionReceiptsNoVAT
    (
         ReceiptCode
       , ReceiptDate
       , WarehouseCode
       , VendorCode
       , RefCode
       , CustomerCode
       , CustomerName
       , MobilePhoneNumber
       , Amount
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATType
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATStatus
       , Remark
       , CreatedDateTime
       , CreatedEmployeeBy
       , IsConfirmed
       , ConfirmedDate
       , ConfirmedEmployeeBy
       , CardPaymentFee
    )
SELECT 
	'BH-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 112) + CONVERT(VARCHAR, P.ID)
	, P.CreatedDateTime
	, P.WarehouseCode
	, P.VendorCode
	, CONVERT(VARCHAR, P.ID)
	, ''
	, P.buyer_name
	, P.buyer_mobile
	, P.Amount
	, 343
	, 298
	, N'Hệ thống tạo'
	, P.CreatedDateTime
	, P.CreatedBy
	, 1
	, P.CreatedDateTime
	, 'SYSTEM'
	, 0
FROM 
	dbo.VinasureHeader P (NOLOCK) 
WHERE 
	P.ID IN (
$CURSOR$
)
